result.execSummary:
Christopher Joseph Mikrut was extradited to another county, state or jurisdiction. Extradition means Christopher Joseph Mikrut was accused or convicted of an offense in another county, state or jurisdiction and was taken there to face their charge(s) or conviction.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Christopher Joseph Mikrut

records.addlTxt:
Activity: Dismissed 
Appearances by video/zoom: Court Official, Court Reporter, Court Clerk, and all Parties referenced in hearing minutes as in court.
8:31 AM Attorney Walter H Isaacson in court by video.  Noah M Tylenda appeared by video for the State of Wisconsin. Defendant extradited. Case dismissed on motion of the State.
Justice Point: Rock County Pretrial Supervision Report
Review hearing on February 10, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Activity: Extradition hearing 
Appearances by video/zoom: Court Official, Court Reporter, Court Clerk, and all Parties referenced in hearing minutes as in court.

9:59 AM Defendant Christopher Joseph Mikrut in court in person and in custody with attorney Walter H Isaacson in person.  Mason C Braunschweig appeared by video for the State of Wisconsin. Defendant waives extradition freely and voluntarily; signs waiver in open court.  Review hearing scheduled for February 10, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Extradition hearing on January 27, 2022 at 10:00 am.

records.addlTxt:
Activity: Initial appearance
Appearances by video/zoom: Court Official, Court Reporter, Court Clerk, and all Parties referenced in hearing minutes as in court.

3:26 PM Defendant Christopher Joseph Mikrut in court in custody at the Rock County Jail by video with attorney Walter H Isaacson by video.  Alexander David Goulart appeared by video for the State of Wisconsin. Complaint filed, copy to defendant, charges and penalties advised, rights given, reading waived.  Cash bond set of $5,000.00 with conditions: Court orders Level 2 supervision through JusticePoint.  Must contact JusticePoint within 24 hours of release from custody. Remand to branch 1 for scheduling.
Court orders Level 2 supervision through JusticePoint.  Must contact JusticePoint within 24 hours of release from custody.
